meanings.definition: A synthetic chemical element with the symbol Bh and atomic number 107.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study bohrium to learn more about elements.
meanings.sent2: Bohrium is a man-made element created in laboratories.
meanings.sent3: When the professor accidentally spilled bohrium in the lab, it caused quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The discovery of bohrium was like finding a hidden treasure in the periodic table.
meanings.sent5: The glow of bohrium under the microscope fascinated the students.
